notes: Does not directly amplify damage as it is dealt, but rather saves all damage values and deals 30% of it 5 seconds after cast. This means that the damage can be avoided by becoming spell immune, invulnerable, or hidden at the end of the duration.

abilities.description: Silences the target unit for 5 seconds. At the end of the silence, 30% of the damage received while silenced is inflicted as bonus magical damage.

name: Orchid Malevolence
description: A garnet rod constructed from the essence of a fire demon.
trivia: The item's name is likely a reference to the weapon of the same name that can be acquired in the 2002 video game Otogi: Myth of Demons.
tips: Orchid is great against Intelligence heroes as they are dependent on their abilities to deal damage, but it is also effective against heroes with escape abilities like Anti-Mage or Weaver and strong initiation like Faceless Void or Enigma.
Get the item quickly before the enemy team gets items able to dispel the silence.
